page.title: 09ROAD TRANSPORT
page.content:
The main road network in the area is determined by reliefand follows the Conwy Valley. The A470 clips the south east corner of the area as it runs along the east bank of the river. On the west bank of the river the B5106 Conwy to Llanrwst road runs through the centre of this area. Ther is a well developed network of minor roads and tracks serving the farm community.
A regular bus service runs down the west side of the valley between Conwy and Llanrwst. The service is hourly during the day and the journey time to Conwy is about 18 minutes. Service numbers Crosville M19, M20.
